title: How is my friend silver?
body: My friend (who I cannot name obviously) just got silver 4, and I never hear the end of it. My issue with that is his win rate. His ranked win rate is 38%. He loses 62% of the games he plays but is silver. He has 14 wins and his main (veigar) KDA is 1.2. Can someone please explain how he is climbing with a 38% win rate?
